「当地域にゲリラ攻撃の可能性」村内全域に２回誤放送

07 Nov 2019, 20:00

　岩手県野田村は７日、「ゲリラ攻撃があった」との趣旨の誤った放送を、防災行政無線を通じて村内全域に流した。
　村の担当者によると、午前１０時５０分頃、全国瞬時警報システム（Ｊアラート）のサイレンが流れた後に、「ゲリラ攻撃情報。当地域にゲリラ攻撃の可能性があります」と放送した。誤放送は２回流れ、約１０分後に訂正の放送を流した。
　当時、業者がＪアラートシステムの更新作業をしており、動作確認中に誤放送が流れたという。
text:
“Possibility of guerrilla attacks in this area” broadcasted twice throughout the village

07 Nov 2019, 20:00

Noda-mura, Iwate Prefecture, broadcasted the entire village on the 7th through an emergency broadcast radio, saying “There was a guerrilla attack” on the 7th.
According to the person in charge of the village, at around 10:50 am, after the siren of the national instantaneous warning system (J Alert) flowed, “Guerilla attack information. There is a possibility of guerrilla attack in this area” was broadcast. The mis-broadcasting flowed twice, and after 10 minutes, the correction was broadcast.
At that time, the contractor was updating the J Alert system, and it was reported that an error message was broadcast during the operation check.
